Kerbals are more similar to the magic Boulder green than jool

Personally, I think Pol is the brother of the Magic Boulder (Vik). They were in a planet/moon configuration, but their orbit was very close to Jool's, except the Pol system was slightly inclined and faster, causing them not to enter Jool's SOI for a long time. One day, though, the orbits were as close as possible, and Pol was pulled in to Jool, and the Magic Boulder (or Vik) was slung out of the sphere of influence. It crossed paths with Duna, and had an orbit slightly above Ike. Eventually, Ike's gravity pulled it in to a very close orbit. This was kept for a while until Ike's gravity finally pulled it in, creating a very large crater above Ike's famous dark spot. Some fragments were sent flying out into space, which is why Magic Boulder Asteroids (Vik Remains) can now be seen today.

Perhaps the magic boulder is a piece of Pol, ejected from some primordial impact and lurking in the solar system forevermore, hunting for the rest of its body.
